description:
Right-wing groups in Brazil are peddling false claims that the heavy rainfall that led to south Brazil's disastrous flooding in May is not related to climate change.

The post The Direct Links Between Southern Brazil’s Massive Flooding and Climate Denial appeared first on DeSmog.
title: The Direct Links Between Southern Brazil’s Massive Flooding and Climate Denial

description:
A deep dive into the petrochemical industry's proposals for the global plastics treaty.

title: How to Create a ‘World Without Waste’? The Plastic Industry Has Ideas.
